rules_text:
Signature – Alabaster Witch, Cerulean Witch, Tenebrous Witch [i](Put your chosen signature into your hand from outside the game when you control two of its named cards.)[/i]
Draw X cards and gain X life. Each opponent discards X cards and loses X life. X is the number of creatures in your sentai. [i](A sentai is up to one creature of each color.)[/i]
